description.zh-cn: 1957年底至1961年初在中国发生的一场政治及社会运动，旨在利用本土劳动力和群众热情，在工业和农业上追求脱离现实的“跃进”，最终导致了严重的经济困难和大规模饥荒。
description.en: A political and social movement in China from late 1957 to early 1961, which aimed to achieve an unrealistic 'leap forward' in industry and agriculture by mobilizing local labor and mass enthusiasm, ultimately leading to severe economic difficulties and a massive famine.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，发动了大跃进运动。
description.en: A key founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who launched the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，在大跃进期间领导了该运动。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which led the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报，在1957年11月13日通过社论正式提出“大跃进”口号。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which officially proposed the slogan 'Great Leap Forward' in an editorial on November 13, 1957.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动导致的严重饥荒时期，造成了数千万人的非正常死亡。
description.en: A period of severe famine caused by the Great Leap Forward, resulting in tens of millions of unnatural deaths.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央为总结“大跃进”的经验教训而召开的中央工作会议。会上对大跃进的错误进行了批评，导致毛泽东退居二线。
description.en: A Central Work Conference convened by the CPC Central Committee to summarize the lessons learned from the 'Great Leap Forward'. The mistakes of the Great Leap Forward were criticized at the conference, leading to Mao Zedong's retreat to the second line of leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，时任国家主席。在七千人大会上对大跃进提出批评。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the CPC and the PRC, serving as the Chairman of the PRC at the time. He criticized the Great Leap Forward at the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动发生的国家。
description.en: The country where the Great Leap Forward took place.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动的政治运动，其起因与大跃进失败后中共党内出现的政治分歧有关。
description.en: A political movement launched by Mao Zedong, its origins are related to the political divisions that emerged within the CPC after the failure of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动的社会主义教育运动，被视为文化大革命的预演，其起因与大跃进失败后的党内分歧有关。
description.en: A socialist education movement launched by Mao Zedong, considered a prelude to the Cultural Revolution, with its origins linked to the inner-party disagreements following the failure of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央召开的一次重要会议，会上彭德怀等人对大跃进的批评被视为“反党”，引发了“反右倾”运动。
description.en: An important meeting convened by the CPC Central Committee, during which criticism of the Great Leap Forward by Peng Dehuai and others was deemed 'anti-Party', triggering the 'Anti-Rightist' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，时任国务院副总理兼国防部长。因在庐山会议上批评大跃进政策而遭到整肃。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, then Vice Premier and Minister of National Defense. He was purged for criticizing the Great Leap Forward policies at the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议后发动的一场政治运动，旨在打击对大跃进持批评意见的党员干部，导致“左”的错误未能及时纠正。
description.en: A political campaign launched after the 1959 Lushan Conference to target Party cadres who were critical of the Great Leap Forward, which prevented the timely correction of 'Leftist' errors.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅。在庐山会议后取代彭德怀出任国防部长，在政治上崛起。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China. He replaced Peng Dehuai as Minister of National Defense after the Lushan Conference and rose politically.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老人物，因在庐山会议期间支持彭德怀的意见而受到牵连。
description.en: A veteran figure of the CPC who was implicated for supporting Peng Dehuai's views during the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老人物，因在庐山会议期间支持彭德怀的意见而受到牵连。
description.en: A veteran figure of the CPC who was implicated for supporting Peng Dehuai's views during the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中共元老人物，因在庐山会议期间支持彭德怀的意见而受到牵连。
description.en: A veteran figure of the CPC who was implicated for supporting Peng Dehuai's views during the Lushan Conference.

description.zh-cn: 指“调整、巩固、充实、提高”的经济方针，由中共八届九中全会正式通过，标志着大跃进运动的结束。
description.en: Refers to the economic policy of 'Readjustment, Consolidation, Filling-out, and Raising standards', officially adopted by the 9th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee, marking the end of the Great Leap Forward.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会
en: 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1969年期间的中央领导机构。其第九次全体会议正式决定实行“八字方针”，结束大跃进。
description.en: The central leading body of the CPC from 1956 to 1969. Its 9th Plenary Session officially decided to implement the 'Eight-Character Policy', ending the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 指社会主义建设总路线、大跃进和人民公社的合称，是大跃进时期的指导思想。其指导地位在七千人大会后下降。
description.en: A collective term for the General Line for Socialist Construction, the Great Leap Forward, and the People's Communes, which served as the guiding ideology during the Great Leap Forward period. Its guiding status declined after the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference.

description.zh-cn: 发生在1975年8月河南驻马店地区的水库大规模溃坝事件，被认为是历史上最严重的人为技术灾难之一。其根源可追溯至大跃进时期粗制滥造的水利工程。
description.en: A large-scale dam failure event in the Zhumadian area of Henan in August 1975, considered one of the most severe man-made technological disasters in history. Its roots can be traced back to the poorly constructed water conservancy projects of the Great Leap Forward period.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国与苏联之间关系的恶化与破裂。苏联对大跃进的批评是导致关系破裂的重要原因之一。
description.en: Refers to the deterioration and rupture of relations between the People's Republic of China and the Soviet Union. Soviet criticism of the Great Leap Forward was a major contributing factor to the split.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的社会主义国家。其领导人赫鲁晓夫对大跃进持批评态度，最终导致中苏关系破裂和苏联撤走在华专家。
description.en: A socialist state in the 20th century. Its leader, Khrushchev, was critical of the Great Leap Forward, which ultimately led to the Sino-Soviet split and the withdrawal of Soviet experts from China.

description.zh-cn: 时任苏联共产党中央委员会第一书记，对大跃进及人民公社政策持批评态度。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, who was critical of the Great Leap Forward and the People's Commune policies.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进期间盛行的虚报、夸大生产成果的风气，尤其在农业领域表现为“放卫星”。
description.en: A prevailing trend during the Great Leap Forward of falsifying and exaggerating production results, particularly manifested in agriculture as 'launching sputniks'.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家。曾撰文尝试用科学论证农业高产的可能性，对大跃进中的“浮夸风”起了推波助澜的作用。
description.en: A Chinese physicist. He wrote articles attempting to scientifically justify the possibility of high agricultural yields, which helped fuel the 'Wind of Exaggeration' during the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进时期在农村建立“人民公社”的运动，是“三面红旗”之一。
description.en: A movement during the Great Leap Forward to establish 'People's Communes' in rural areas, one of the 'Three Red Banners'.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进时期发起的群众性钢铁生产运动，以“土法炼钢”为特征，造成巨大资源浪费和环境破坏。
description.en: A mass steel production movement launched during the Great Leap Forward, characterized by 'backyard furnaces', which resulted in immense resource waste and environmental damage.

en: Surpass the UK and catch up with the US

description.zh-cn: 大跃进时期的主要口号和目标，旨在短期内使中国的主要工业产品产量超过英国，赶上美国。
description.en: A major slogan and goal of the Great Leap Forward, aiming to make China's output of major industrial products surpass that of the UK and catch up with the US in a short period.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，时任国务院总理。最初使用了“跃进”一词，并在运动初期支持了相关政策。
description.en: One of the key leaders of the CPC and PRC, serving as the Premier of the State Council. He was the first to use the term 'leap forward' and supported related policies in the early stages of the movement.

zh-cn: 鼓足干劲、力争上游、多快好省地建设社会主义

description.zh-cn: 中共八大二次会议通过的指导方针，是“三面红旗”之一，为大跃进运动提供了理论依据。
description.en: The guiding principle adopted at the Second Session of the Eighth CPC National Congress, one of the 'Three Red Banners', which provided the theoretical basis for the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国共产党的最高领导人，毛泽东发动并领导了“大跃进”运动。
description.en: As the supreme leader of the Communist Party of China, Mao Zedong launched and led the 'Great Leap Forward' movement.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东的领导下，中国共产党高层发动并全面推行了大跃进运动。
description.en: Under the leadership of Mao Zedong, the high-level leadership of the Communist Party of China launched and fully implemented the Great Leap Forward movement.

description.zh-cn: 1957年11月13日，《人民日报》发表社论，首次正式提出了“大跃进”的口号。
description.en: On November 13, 1957, the People's Daily published an editorial that officially put forward the slogan 'Great Leap Forward' for the first time.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进运动的错误政策，如高指标、浮夸风、全民大炼钢和人民公社化，直接导致了国民经济失调和农业生产急剧下降，酿成了全国性的大饥荒。
description.en: The erroneous policies of the Great Leap Forward, such as high targets, the 'wind of exaggeration', the nationwide steel campaign, and the people's commune movement, directly led to economic imbalance and a sharp decline in agricultural production, resulting in a nationwide famine.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进造成的严重后果促使中共中央召开七千人大会，以总结经验教训并纠正错误。
description.en: The severe consequences of the Great Leap Forward prompted the CPC Central Committee to convene the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference to summarize lessons learned and correct mistakes.

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上，大跃进的错误受到批评，毛泽东本人也作了自我批评，并在此后一度退居权力二线。
description.en: At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, the errors of the Great Leap Forward were criticized, Mao Zedong himself made a self-criticism, and subsequently retreated to the second line of power for a period.

description.zh-cn: 在七千人大会上，时任国家主席刘少奇的报告中将大饥荒的原因归结为“三分天灾，七分人祸”，公开批评了大跃进的错误。
description.en: At the Seven Thousand Cadres Conference, then-Chairman Liu Shaoqi attributed the cause of the great famine to 'three parts natural disaster and seven parts man-made disaster' in his report, openly criticizing the errors of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进的失败加剧了毛泽东与刘少奇等党内其他领导人的分歧，被认为是毛泽东后来发动文化大革命以夺回权力的重要伏笔。
description.en: The failure of the Great Leap Forward exacerbated the disagreements between Mao Zedong and other party leaders like Liu Shaoqi, and is considered an important prelude to Mao's later launch of the Cultural Revolution to regain power.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进失败后党内分歧的加剧，促使毛泽东于1963年发动了旨在进行社会主义教育的四清运动。
description.en: The intensification of inner-party disagreements after the failure of the Great Leap Forward prompted Mao Zedong to launch the Four Cleanups Movement in 1963, aimed at socialist education.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议期间，彭德怀向毛泽东上“万言书”，系统地批评了大跃进中的“左”倾错误。
description.en: During the 1959 Lushan Conference, Peng Dehuai submitted a 'ten-thousand-word letter' to Mao Zedong, systematically criticizing the 'Leftist' errors of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上，毛泽东将彭德怀的批评视为对自己的挑战，将其打成“反党集团”并进行整肃，免去其国防部长职务。
description.en: At the Lushan Conference, Mao Zedong viewed Peng Dehuai's criticism as a challenge to his authority, branded him as an 'anti-Party clique', and purged him, removing him from his post as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 庐山会议上对彭德怀等人的批判直接引发了在全党范围内开展的“反右倾”斗争，以肃清对大跃进的批评声音。
description.en: The criticism of Peng Dehuai and others at the Lushan Conference directly triggered the 'Anti-Rightist' struggle throughout the party to suppress criticism of the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 反右倾运动造成党内无人敢于讲真话，使得大跃进的错误政策未能及时刹车，并进一步助长了“跃进”风潮，加剧了灾难。
description.en: The Anti-Rightist campaign created a climate where no one in the party dared to speak the truth, preventing the timely correction of the Great Leap Forward's erroneous policies and further fueling the 'leap forward' trend, thus exacerbating the disaster.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上，林彪支持毛泽东并批判彭德怀，会后接任国防部长，其政治地位迅速上升。
description.en: At the Lushan Conference, Lin Biao supported Mao Zedong and criticized Peng Dehuai. After the conference, he took over as Minister of National Defense, and his political status rose rapidly.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 面对大跃进造成的严重后果，中共八届九中全会正式决定实行“调整、巩固、充实、提高”的八字方针。
description.en: Facing the severe consequences of the Great Leap Forward, the 9th Plenary Session of the 8th CPC Central Committee officially decided to implement the 'Eight-Character Policy' of 'Readjustment, Consolidation, Filling-out, and Raising standards'.

description.zh-cn: “八字方针”的实行标志着对大跃进政策的正式调整和纠正，大跃进运动实际上被停止。
description.en: The implementation of the 'Eight-Character Policy' marked the official adjustment and correction of the Great Leap Forward policies, and the movement was effectively halted.

description.zh-cn: 时任苏联领导人赫鲁晓夫及其领导的苏共公开反对大跃进中的人民公社和全民大炼钢等政策，认为其是危险和错误的。
description.en: Then Soviet leader Khrushchev and the CPSU he led openly opposed policies of the Great Leap Forward such as the People's Communes and the Nationwide Steel Production Movement, considering them dangerous and wrong.

description.zh-cn: 苏联对大跃进政策的批评和中共的强硬回应，是导致中苏两党、两国关系破裂的重要原因之一。
description.en: The Soviet Union's criticism of the Great Leap Forward policies and the CPC's hardline response were among the key reasons for the rupture in relations between the two parties and countries.

description.zh-cn: 因中苏关系破裂，苏联政府决定召回所有在华工作的苏联专家，并撕毁援助合同，加剧了中国的经济困难。
description.en: Due to the Sino-Soviet split, the Soviet government decided to recall all Soviet experts working in China and tore up aid contracts, exacerbating China's economic difficulties.

description.zh-cn: 大跃进期间“以蓄为主”方针下群众运动式兴建的大量水库存在严重质量问题，为1975年河南驻马店地区的大规模溃坝灾难埋下了隐患。
description.en: During the Great Leap Forward, a large number of reservoirs were built in a mass movement style under the 'storage-oriented' policy, which had serious quality problems, creating hidden dangers for the large-scale dam failure disaster in the Zhumadian area of Henan in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 通过在报刊发表文章，用“科学计算”论证农作物亩产的巨大潜力，为大跃进时期的“浮夸风”和高指标提供了理论支持，产生了推波助澜的影响。
description.en: By publishing articles in newspapers and journals, he used 'scientific calculations' to argue for the immense potential of crop yields, providing theoretical support for the 'wind of exaggeration' and high targets of the Great Leap Forward, which had a fueling effect.

description.zh-cn: “鼓足干劲、力争上游、多快好省地建设社会主义”的总路线是“三面红旗”之一，为大跃进运动提供了核心的指导思想和政治动员口号。
description.en: The General Line of 'going all out, aiming high and achieving greater, faster, better and more economical results in building socialism' was one of the 'Three Red Banners', providing the core guiding ideology and political mobilization slogan for the Great Leap Forward.

description.zh-cn: 作为大跃进“以钢为纲”方针的具体体现，全国范围内发起了全民大炼钢铁运动。
description.en: As a concrete manifestation of the 'steel as the key link' policy of the Great Leap Forward, a nationwide campaign for all people to produce steel was launched.

description.zh-cn: 人民公社化运动是大跃进的重要组成部分和“三面红旗”之一，旨在农村地区建立集工农兵学商为一体的组织。
description.en: The People's Commune Movement was an important component of the Great Leap Forward and one of the 'Three Red Banners', aiming to establish organizations integrating industry, agriculture, military, education, and commerce in rural areas.

description.zh-cn: 在“大跃进”急于求成的氛围下，全国各行各业普遍出现了虚报产量、夸大成绩的“浮夸风”。
description.en: In the atmosphere of haste for success during the 'Great Leap Forward', a 'wind of exaggeration' characterized by false reporting of output and exaggeration of achievements became widespread across all sectors nationwide.
